data.title: Azim Premji Profile
data.meta_description:
Azim Premji Profile - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1. Azim Premji is the chairman of Wipro Limited, one of the largest IT companies in India. He took over the family business in 1966 at age 21 and transformed it from a $2 million company dealing in cooking fats into a $7 billion global IT company. 
2. Under Premji's leadership, Wipro diversified into software, business services, and R&D. It is now the largest independent R&D services provider worldwide. 
3. Premji is considered one of India's most successful entrepreneurs and philanthropists. He has received several honors including India's second highest civilian award Padma Vibhushana.
